title: Ruud overcomes injury to reach Madrid final
description: With the help of painkillers, Casper Ruud overcame a rib ailment to defeat Francisco Cerundolo in straight sets and reach the Madrid Open final on Friday.

title: Draper set for world's top 5 after Madrid QF win
description: Jack Draper's promising career reached a new high after his latest win ensured he will move into the top five of the world rankings for the first time.
author: ESPN

title: Unlock the Perfect Slice Serve - Essential Tennis Podcast #415
description: The wide slice serve is a CRITICAL tool to have in your tool box. It pulls opponents out of position, opens the court up for you to hit into, exposes their usually weaker backhand side, and forces them to run twice as far for the next shot - if they even get it at all. Letâ€™s take a deep dive into how YOU can develop this powerful weapon, step by step in this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: 3 Djokovic Secrets To Winning More Matches - Essential Tennis Podcast #414
description: In this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast, you're going to learn the top 3 tactical secrets of Novak Djokovic that you can apply in your very next match. Use these tools to gain precision, consistency, and offense to make your opponents more uncomfortable, win more points, and win more matches.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: Watch Wawrinka on Challenger TV
description: Stan Wawrinka will compete in the Open Aix Provence CrÃ©dit Agricole semi-finals Saturday, when he faces Borna Gojo at the ATP Challenger 175 event in France. The Swiss wild card is aiming for his first final appearance at any level since July 2023. Wawrinka and Gojo are scheduled to play the second match from 2 p.m. local time. The first semi-final will feature former No. 12 Borna Coric and Peru's Ignacio Buse. Coric is seeking a season-leading fourth Challenger crown this week.Last 4 standing in France! ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡·#ATPChallenger | @OpenduPaysdAix pic.twitter.com/LgJThE5wvAâ€” ATP Challenger Tour (@ATPChallenger) May 2, 2025 Fans can tune into Challenger TV to stream all ATP Challenger Tour matches live and on demand at no cost.At the Millennium Estoril Open in Portugal, second seed Alex Michelsen meets Miomir Kecmanovic, a rare Top 50 showdown at Challenger level. Andrea Pellegrino faces Aleksandar Vukic at 3 p.m. local time, with Michelsen and Kecmanovic to follow, not before 4:30 p.m. local time. Watch Stan Wawrinka vs. Borna Gojo (second match from 2 p.m. local time) Watch Alex Michelsen vs. Miomir Kecmanovic in Estoril, Portugal (not before 4:30 p.m. local time) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: Wawrinka, Coric remain on collision course at Aix-en-Provence Challenger
description: Stan Wawrinka spoiled Nishesh Basavareddy's 20th birthday on Friday, when the 40-year-old earned a 7-6(8), 6-3 victory against the American to reach the semi-finals of the Open Aix Provence CrÃ©dit Agricole. The Swiss rode his momentum following a marathon first set to book his first semi-final ticket at any level since last October at the ATP 250 in Stockholm. Wawrinka held set point on return at 5-4, but was forced to a tie-break, during which he saved two set points before closing out the opener. The wild card finished the match having won 80 per cent of his first-serve points, compared to Basavareddy's 66 per cent, according to Infosys ATP Stats.Last 4 standing in France! ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡·#ATPChallenger | @OpenduPaysdAix pic.twitter.com/LgJThE5wvAâ€” ATP Challenger Tour (@ATPChallenger) May 2, 2025 Borna Coric also advanced to the last fourÂ with a 7-5, 6-4 win against Mariano Navone, continuing his Challenger resurgence and remaining on course for a final showdown with Wawrinka. "I thought this was the best match I've played on clay so far this year," said Coric, who is aiming for a season-leading fourth Challenger title. "I was really happy with my performance, I was serving good, I was playing from the baseline great. I had a small drop off in the second set, but overall I'm really happy. I need to recover well and use some ice as it was obviously a long match, but I'm looking forward to tomorrow." While it may be tempting to look ahead to a championship match featuring fan favourites' Wawrinka and Coric, the three-time major champion will first have to get past Coric's countryman Borna Gojo while the 28-year-old faces Peruvian qualifier Ignacio Buse in the semi-finals.Buse led Reilly Opelka 7-6(4), 2-3 when the American was forced to retire due to a right hip injury. Gojo defeated Valentin Vacherot 6-2, 6-3. Michelsen, Kecmanovic set Top 50 semi-final in Estoril It's not often an ATP Challenger Tour event features a semi-final consisting of two Top 50 players, but Alex Michelsen and Miomir Kecmanovic have ensured this feat at the MIllennium Estoril Open. Michelsen, seeded second, dispatched Luca Nardi 6-3, 6-4 in a dominant baseline performance to reach his first clay semi-final at any level while Kecmanovic overcame home favourite and third seed Nuno Borges 6-0, 6-7(5), 6-4. Italian qualifier Andrea Pellegrino, World No. 237, followed his biggest career win against Felix Auger-Aliassime in Thursday's second-round action with another standout victory, fighting off seventh seed Nicolas Jarry 7-6(0), 5-7, 6-1. Pellegrino's semi-final opponent will be Aleksandar Vukic, who raced past Bernabe Zapata Miralles 6-1, 6-1. A full crowd enjoys quarter-final action in Estoril. Credit: Mike Lawrence/ATP Challenger Tour[NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: GB's Draper beats Musetti to reach Madrid Open final
description: Britain's Jack Draper books his spot in the Madrid Open final with a hard-fought 6-3 7-6 (7-4) victory against Lorenzo Musetti.

title: Gauff thrashes Swiatek at Madrid Open
description: Coco Gauff produces a stunning display to thrash four-time French Open champion Iga Swiatek 6-1 6-1 and reach the final of the Madrid Open.

title: Madrid Open 2025 Day 10 Semi Final Recap
description: On Friday at the 2025 Mutua Madrid Open, Casper Ruud and Jack Draper secured their final place with hard-fought semi-final victories at the Caja Magica. Ruud overcame Francisco Cerundolo, while Draper defeated Lorenzo Musetti, setting up their first Head2Head meeting in Sundayâ€™s championship match. With both players showing resolve and skill to reach the final, â€¦
